notifications.title: A New Chapter Begins: Welcome Manar Shawareb, Senior HR Manager! ❤️❤️❤️
notifications.message:
Dear T&C Family,

We are thrilled to announce a significant addition to our leadership team. Please join us in extending a very warm welcome to Manar Shawareb, our new Senior Human Resources Manager!

Manar is joining us at a crucial time, bringing with her an exceptional blend of academic rigor and practical expertise. With both an MBA and a DBA, and over 16 years of strategic HR experience, her background is perfectly aligned with our goals for transformation and excellence.

Manar's journey is defined by her ability to lead the people agenda, drive strategic change, and implement a true people-first mindset.

We are particularly excited about her track record in:

• Strategic Transformation: Aligning HR initiatives directly with core business objectives.
• Organizational Excellence: Fostering environments built for continuous growth and development.

Manar’s passion and agility will be invaluable as we continue to shape a robust and supportive culture at T&C Garments.

You can reach Manar through email: manar.shawareb@tcgarments.com

We look forward to the inspiration and positive impact she will bring. Please take a moment to introduce yourselves and make her feel at home!

Warm regards,
HR Department
T&C Garments
